entry.title: Bitmain Antspace HK3 V6 Hydro Mining Container
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:
Price: 100000.00


Tailored for efficiency and optimized for warmer climates, the BITMAIN ANTSPACE HK3, also known as the Antbox H3 Version 6, boasts a peak capacity of 210 units of Antminer S19 Pro+ Hydro with a total power consumption just over 1MW. Each container order requires a minimum complement of 210 S19/S21 Hydro units. Consisting of a cooling tower and a mining container, the AntSpace HK3 V6 is sold as a two-piece stackable set, detailed in the brochure available for download.

In contrast to Bitmain, we offer DDP (delivery duty paid) service for the ASIC miners but not for the container. The price of the AntSpace excludes door-to-door ocean freight, with freight costs to be provided at the time of loading due to weekly variations and location-specific rates. ExWorks / FOB incoterms are also available, and a 1-year manufacturer warranty is included. Please note that the warranty for the S19 Pro+ Hydro is void if used outside the AntSpace HK3 V6 system. Coolant is not included but can be ordered separately.

Customers have the option to select the cooling tower type suitable for their local climate, with options including the EC1 DWT for hot climates (10°C to 40°C), which holds major global certifications, and the EC2-DT, a single dry cooling tower ideal for colder climates (-20°C to 26°C) with Chinese CCSC electrical certification. The EC3, a Plate Heat Exchanger system, is designed to redirect and repurpose generated heat to an external system.

All Links / Book Consultation -  https://linktr.ee/bitcoincapitalist

entry.title: 20ft Air-Cooling Bitcoin Mining Container - 162 Miners - 0.7 MW Power Load
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:
Price: 24000.00

The 20ft Air Cooling container is a modular mining container that employs standard container construction and integrates five modular systems within it. It can rapidly start operating upon connecting to both electricity and a network.

It is easy to transport and install for mining farm construction. Utilizing the Avalon Air Cooling Box will not only reduce construction costs but also shorten the construction period.

8 Week delivery from when payment is received. 

Specs:

  • Size:   5950 x 2200x 2500 (LxWxH)(mm)
  • Capacity of Miners: 162 Miners
  • Power Load: 700 kW
  • Input Power: 380V~415V AC，50/60 Hz
  • Standard: CE/UL/CSA
  • Weight: < 3 T
  • Color: Customization
  • Transport: Container transport

entry.title: Iceriver KS3M 6000Gh/s KAS Crypto Miner (6Th/s)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:
Price: 12227.00

Precision-engineered for the KHeavyHash algorithm, the Iceriver KS3M emerges as a top-tier Kaspa miner, delivering an impressive maximum hash rate of 6000Gh/s. Operating with a power consumption of 3400W, the KS3M empowers miners to efficiently mine Kaspa coins, overcoming challenges posed by varying mining difficulty levels. The recommended voltage for the Iceriver KS3M KAS miner is 170-300V AC.

Equipped with an efficient air cooling system, the Iceriver KS3M promptly dissipates the heat generated during cryptocurrency mining, ensuring sustained peak performance. To optimize mining performance, it is advisable to maintain a suitable atmospheric temperature ranging from 0 to 35 °C and humidity levels between 10 and 90 °C. This meticulous attention to environmental conditions enhances the overall reliability and effectiveness of the KS3M miner.

Mineable Coins

  • Kaspa

Mineable Pools

  • NiceHash
Manufacturer Iceriver
Model KS3M
Also known as Iceriver KS3M KAS Miner
Release August 2023
Weight Net 14400g
Weight Gross 17100g
Voltage 170-300V AC
Size w/o 370 x 195 x 290mm
Size with 490 x 300 x 400mm
Power 3400W
Interface Ethernet
Temperature 0 – 35 °C
Humidity 10 – 90 °C

entry.title: Bitmain Anminer L7 (9.5Gh) 3425W Crypto Miner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:
Price: 8400.00

Price Includes
  • Shipping
  • Import taxes to Paraguay
  • Installation

Hosting Details 

  • $0.06 kWh
  • 7% of Bitcoin mined for maintenance & management
  • 2 Months rent deposit
  • $150 per unit install fee

Model: Antminer L7 (9.5Gh) from Bitmain, mining Scrypt algorithm with a maximum hashrate of 9.5Gh/s and a power consumption of 3425W.

Bitmain, the leading mining hardware manufacturer, has introduced the Antminer L7, a Scrypt miner with various hash rates. Launched in November 2021, the Bitmain Antminer L7 (9.5Gh) is specifically optimized for the Scrypt algorithm, offering exceptional energy efficiency at 0.361j/Mh with a power consumption of 3425W. Another variant, the Bitmain Antminer L7 (9.3Gh), was released in February 2022, providing an energy efficiency of 0.368j/Mh at the same power consumption of 3425W.

The profitability of the Bitmain Antminer L7 is notable due to its outstanding performance, maximized hash rate, and ultimate energy efficiency. With the capability to mine numerous coins, the Antminer L7 is a popular choice among miners.

This successful model, available in various hash rates, caters to the diverse mining needs of users. Its high computing power, standardized design, and user-friendly interface with multiple hash rate options allow miners to choose hardware that aligns with their preferences. The efficient air cooling system, equipped with four high-speed fans for heat dissipation, prevents overheating and contributes to the longevity of the hardware. This, in turn, helps miners reduce electricity costs and increase their mining profit margins. Manufactured by the reputable Bitmain, the Antminer L7 features high-quality components, making it a worthwhile investment for miners.


Manufacturer Bitmain
Model Antminer L7 (9.5Gh)
Also known as Antminer L7 9500Mh
Release November 2021
Size 195 x 290 x 370mm
Weight 15000g
Noise level 75db
Fan(s) 4
Power 3425W
Interface Ethernet
Temperature 5 - 45 °C
Humidity 5 - 95 %

Mineable Coins
  • Litecoin (LTC)
  • Dogecoin (DOGE)
  • Gulden(NLG)
  • Emerald (EMD)
  • Verge (XVG)
  • Florincoin (FLO)
  • Einsteinium (EMC2)
  • DigiByte (DGB)
  • Auroracoin (AUR)

Mining Pools

  • Poolin
  • NiceHash
  • Easy2Mine
  • AntPool
  • Litecoinpool

  • Miners ship worldwide from our warehouse in China
